DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare reading skin test result patient suspected penicillin allergy in-house penicillin test preparation commercial available penicillin test kit .
DOC.brief_title: Penicillin Skin Testing Patients With History Allergic Reactions Betalactams
DOC.detailed_description: The result skin test immediate reading compare alkali-treated penicillin G DAP reagent Diater
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients history hypersensitivity reaction betalactams ; penicillin , aminopenicillins , cephalosporins 2 . 1565 year age 1 . On antihistamine/ discontinue antihistamine test 2 . Having asthma exacerbation 3 . Being pregnant 4 . Suffering severe systemic disease/ bad health
